function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/test_app.py has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/test_app.py:
   523	
   524	# --- Tests for PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id> (Update Feed URL) ---
   525	
   526	@patch('backend.app.fetch_feed')
   527	def test_update_feed_url_success(mock_fetch_feed, client, setup_tabs_and_feeds):
   528	    """Test PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id> successfully updates feed URL and name."""
   529	    feed_id = setup_tabs_and_feeds["feed1_id"]
   530	    new_url = "https://example.com/new-feed.xml"
   531	    
   532	    # Mock the feed fetch to return a valid feed
   533	    mock_feed = MagicMock()
   534	    mock_feed.feed = {
   535	        'title': 'New Feed Title',
   536	        'link': 'https://example.com'
   537	    }
   538	    mock_fetch_feed.return_value = mock_feed
   539	    
   540	    response = client.put(f'/api/feeds/{feed_id}', json={'url': new_url})
   541	    
   542	    assert response.status_code == 200
   543	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/test_app.py
+++ /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/test_app.py
@@ -527,2 +527 @@
-@patch('backend.app.fetch_and_update_feed')
-def test_update_feed_url_success(mock_fetch_and_update, mock_fetch_feed, client, setup_tabs_and_feeds):
+def test_update_feed_url_success(mock_fetch_feed, client, setup_tabs_and_feeds):
@@ -540 +538,0 @@
-    mock_fetch_and_update.return_value = (True, 2)  # success, num_new_items
